short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view and connect to lurkers.io servers without needing to open the game first.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view and connect to lurkers.io servers without needing to open the game first.
You can search servers simply by typing.
